accuracy.description: The correctness of the solution provided by the system.

conciseness.description: The extent to which the provided solution is concise and free of unnecessary information.

stepwise_clarity.description: How easy it is to understand the solution steps provided by the system.

proper_methodology.description: The appropriateness of the methods and techniques used to solve the problem.

generalization.description: How well the provided solution can be generalized to solve similar problems.

time_efficiency.description: The time taken by the system to provide a solution.
